title: SIMPLER LIFESTYLE IN BEAUTIFUL NATURAL SURROUNDINGS
description: Enter through the tile foyer complete with office alcove to a spacious great room featuring a 12 foot vaulted ceiling. You'll find stunning eco-friendly bamboo flooring throughout, an energy efficient tankless hot water heater, and wood-frame Pella windows to enjoy scenic views of the neighboring pasture. The kitchen is complete with custom maple cabinets, stainless steel appliances, granite counters, built-in microwave. under-cabinet lighting, huge pantry, and gas cooking that home chefs wish for! French doors lead to the master bedroom with roomy walk-in closet, and access to the versatile loft area - there are so many possible uses for this bonus space! You'll find lots of entertainment room both indoors and out, including a prewired speaker system, recessed lighting, and huge 16 x 35 patio. Set back from the road down a long paved driveway, this home offers both the privacy and the space to support a sustainable lifestyle. Raised bed gardens, greenhouse, chicken coop, stone root cellar, and large fenced area to keep your small livestock. While the square footage may be modest, this well-maintained home lacks nothing in amenities. Perfect for those looking to enjoy a simpler lifestyle in beautiful natural surroundings.

title: Skilled Labor For Rent Opportunity
description:
I have a apartment that needs remodeling finishing and maintnence. I'm offering to help someone in need, that can help me in return with labor. Please leave a name, number and pics of work you have done. In return I will sned you pics of the apartment and contact you to set up an appointment.
My terms are simple. No lies, no drugs, no drug addicts, or prostitutes. We can discuss and agree what amount of labor will cover 1 month of rent. If you have a full time job Im flexibale, if not week days you work on the agreed work, weekends are yours. If all goes well, we can continue on.
The more you can do the merrier, work I need consist of Drywall, Spackling, Framing, Trim, Plumbng, Kitchen Remodeling, etc. Once again I'm looking to help someone that can help me, so this can be a win win situation. Pictures are available upon request.
- Requirements
A valid Photo I.D., and other information needed to perform a background check will be asked for before we can start. I don't care about a criminal record, but somethings I'm not allowing on my property.

title: NEWLY RENOVATED APARTMENTS AT EMERSON APARTMENTS
description:
EMERSON APARTMENTS
We are located in the greater northeast section of Philadelphia right off of Bustleton
Avenue with Evarts as the cross street. Our apartments are fully renovated with brand
new kitchens and bathrooms! Parking lot in the rear of the building and laundry facilities on site!
Don’t miss this opportunity to find the home you will love!
We are open for viewing Monday through Friday 10:00 am to 4:00 pm.
Please give us a call to schedule an appointment. You may bring along
the following so you can apply the same day:
1. The application fee in the form of a money order. The
application fee is $45 for one applicant and $55 for two applicants.
Any adult moving in MUST be on the application.
2. Proof of your monthly income such as, pay stubs, SSI/SSDI award
letter or statement of pension payments. We do not accept bank
statements as proof of income. We must be able to verify your income.
3. A copy of your social security card and ID as proof of your identity.
In order to qualify for an apartment, your credit report must have no relevant
landlord tenant filings or evictions. In addition, you cannot have any kind of arrest record.
Your income needs to be two and a half times
the cost of the rent.
**You will need to make your own copies**
Once you are approved for residency, you will need to pay one month's
security to hold the apartment. An apartment takes about three to five
weeks to make ready to move in. Once the apartment is ready, we
require an additional two months of rent: first and last month's rent.
ONE BEDROOM APARTMENTS FOR $1000 PER MONTH
TWO BEDROOM APARTMENTS $1300 PER MONTH
-Price of rent includes gas and water. (heating, cooking and hot water included)
-$25 monthly pet fee
